effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak!, increasing the damage of your Ferocious Bite, Rip, and Primal Wrath by 3%, stacking up to 10 times. Ferocious Bite, Rip, and Primal Wrath have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!. Free Ferocious Bites are exempt from this chance.

Set: When you consume Apex Predator's Craving, become a Big Winner, dealing 1.1 million Physical damage to Apex Predator's primary target and increasing the damage of your periodic effects by 16% for 6 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cowl of the Guiltless

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,755 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 204 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
